snippet: Elisa Byard, 58, who makes $10 an hour as a home health aide, has had trouble paying the rent. She stayed with friends and family and then entered the shelter system, but now has an apartment.
abstract: Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens, one of the seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Elisa Byard pay back rent.
lead_paragraph: Elisa Byard, 58, who makes $10 an hour as a home health aide, has had trouble paying the rent. She stayed with friends and family and then entered the shelter system, but now has an apartment.

headline.print_headline: After Six Years of Homelessness, Taking Comfort in an Apartment of Her Own
headline.main: After Six Years of Homelessness, Taking Comfort in an Apartment of Her Own

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
